description: One of Welkin`s former classmates who studied archaeology and now acts as tank commander of Gallia`s Squad 1. After examining desert ruins built by the Valkyrur, he gains an intense interest in Valkyrur history and the Darcsen Calamity. This interest slowly turns into obsession, however, as he desperately searches for a means by which the war with the Empire could be won.
name: Faldio Landzaat
